alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding along Bijou Creek caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including Bijou Creek in Morgan County. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas along Bijou Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM MDT, emergency management reported flooding along Bijou creek in the advisory area. This will cause small stream flooding and potential road closures. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bijou Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Morgan County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
